Html:
When I first branch, there is a branch ICON to the left of the branch folders in Source Code Explorer.  But after I merge, it goes away.

Assuming this is expected behavior, can someone explain the philosophy of why the icon would change at that point? 

Thanks,
Neal

TFS 2010 introduces a new branch icon that is different from the folder icon that you would see in TFS 2008.

I am not sure what behavior you are seeing, when you say taht an icon appears or disappears. I do not see this behavior in 2010.

Note that the Team Project has a different icon from either the folder or branch icon.

Regards,

Bill Heys
VS ALM Ranger
